articles.description: As the company plans to move away from Intel processors entirely.
articles.content: Apple‘s goal to sell computers with its own processors may finally come to fruition in 2021. The technology giant has relied on current supplier Intel Corp since 2006, but reports have hinted that the company plans to roll out a MacBook featuring processors b… [+1973 chars]

articles.author: Kate Kozuch
articles.title: Apple Watch five years later: What I love and hate - Tom's Guide
articles.description: What I think of the Apple Watch on its 5th birthday
articles.content:
When I bought the first-ever Apple Watch five years ago, I thought my dreams of becoming a cyborg with a robot army would finally come true. Or, at the very least, Id be the ultimate, up-in-coming hotshot tech reporter on my upstate college campus. 
My anarc… [+5879 chars]

articles.title: WWE 2K21 Is Canceled, But Franchise Isn't Dead - GameSpot
articles.description: The WWE announces that there won't be a new WWE 2K game this year but 2K says fans should watch out for "exciting news" on Monday.
articles.content: The WWE has officially confirmed that the next WWE 2K game is canceled. WWE 2K21 will not be released, management said on an earnings call. The news comes following potentially-delayed workflows due to the ongoing pandemic and a particularly poor showing from… [+1467 chars]
